item.title: Living the dream, a new project
item.description: Living The Dream. Fired up the DAW and started a new project feeling inspired. Problem is that I get easily bored. Umpf Inc. at Soundcloud. Uploaded the unfinished song at Soundcloud. https://soundcloud.com/umpf-inc/living-the-dream.
